GSD.product_version: versions from v4.18 to before v5.18.3
GSD.description:
tty: fix deadlock caused by calling printk() under tty_port->lock

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.3 by commit 0bcf44903ef4df742dcada86ccaedd25374ffb50, it was introduced in version v4.18 by commit b6da31b2c07c46f2dcad1d86caa835227a16d9ff. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tty: fix deadlock caused by calling printk() under tty_port->lock
OSV.details:
tty: fix deadlock caused by calling printk() under tty_port->lock
